<h2>Interactive Gantt Chart entirely made in SVG!</h2> <div class="gantt"> </div> <script> var tasks = [ { id: 'Task 1', name: 'Redesign website', start: '2016-12-28', end: '2016-12-31', dependencies: 'Task 2', custom_class: 'cc-blue' // optional }, { id: 'Task 2', name: 'Redesign more', start: '2017-01-01', end: '2017-01-05', progress: 0, dependencies: '', custom_class: 'bar-milestone' // optional }, { id: 'Task 3', name: 'Redesign another', start: '2017-01-05', end: '2017-01-12', progress: 0, dependencies: 'Task 1, Task 2', custom_class: 'bar', // optional read_only: true } ]; var gantt = new Gantt(".gantt", tasks); var new_height = gantt.$svg.getAttribute('height') - 80; gantt.$svg.setAttribute('height', new_height); </script>
